body_html:
@orokusaki , I get the same error.

In fact, after attempting to install torchvision through pipenv, you can't install other packages in the pipenv either.

pipenv --three
pipenv install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.3.0.post4-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl
pipenv install torchvision
pipenv install pep8

torchvision fails.

You can try it with other packages too, numpy, matplotlib, I just picked pep8, because I knew it wasn't going to be installed as a dependency.

~/t $ pipenv install pep8
Installing pep8…
Collecting pep8
  Using cached pep8-1.7.1-py2.py3-none-any.whl
Installing collected packages: pep8
Successfully installed pep8-1.7.1

Adding pep8 to Pipfile's [packages]…
Locking [dev-packages] dependencies…
Locking [packages] dependencies…
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mark/.local/bin/pipenv", line 11, in <module>
    sys.exit(cli())
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/vendor/click/core.py", line 722, in __call__
    return self.main(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/vendor/click/core.py", line 697, in main
    rv = self.invoke(ctx)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/vendor/click/core.py", line 1066, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/vendor/click/core.py", line 895, in invoke
    return ctx.invoke(self.callback, **ctx.params)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/vendor/click/core.py", line 535, in invoke
    return callback(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/cli.py", line 1934, in install
    do_lock(system=system, pre=pre)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/cli.py", line 1102, in do_lock
    pre=pre
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/utils.py", line 545, in resolve_deps
    resolved_tree = actually_resolve_reps(deps, index_lookup, markers_lookup, project, sources, verbose, clear, pre)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/utils.py", line 507, in actually_resolve_reps
    resolved_tree.update(resolver.resolve(max_rounds=PIPENV_MAX_ROUNDS))
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/piptools/resolver.py", line 102, in resolve
    has_changed, best_matches = self._resolve_one_round()
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/piptools/resolver.py", line 200, in _resolve_one_round
    for dep in self._iter_dependencies(best_match):
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/piptools/resolver.py", line 296, in _iter_dependencies
    dependencies = self.repository.get_dependencies(ireq)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/piptools/repositories/pypi.py", line 153, in get_dependencies
    result = reqset._prepare_file(self.finder, ireq)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/pip/req/req_set.py", line 639, in _prepare_file
    abstract_dist.prep_for_dist()
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/pip/req/req_set.py", line 134, in prep_for_dist
    self.req_to_install.run_egg_info()
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/pip/req/req_install.py", line 438, in run_egg_info
    command_desc='python setup.py egg_info')
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/pip/utils/__init__.py", line 707, in call_subprocess
    % (command_desc, proc.returncode, cwd))
pip.exceptions.InstallationError: Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/tmp_39myfnkbuild/torch/

@orokusaki , I get the same error.
In fact, after attempting to install torchvision through pipenv, you can't install other packages in the pipenv either.
pipenv --three
pipenv install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.3.0.post4-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl
pipenv install torchvision
pipenv install pep8

torchvision fails.
You can try it with other packages too, numpy, matplotlib, I just picked pep8, because I knew it wasn't going to be installed as a dependency.
~/t $ pipenv install pep8
Installing pep8…
Collecting pep8
  Using cached pep8-1.7.1-py2.py3-none-any.whl

  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/piptools/resolver.py", line 296, in _iter_dependencies

  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/piptools/repositories/pypi.py", line 153, in get_dependencies

  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/pip/req/req_set.py", line 639, in _prepare_file

body:
@orokusaki , I get the same error.

In fact, after attempting to install torchvision through pipenv, you can't install other packages in the pipenv either.


```
pipenv --three
pipenv install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu/torch-0.3.0.post4-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl
pipenv install torchvision
pipenv install pep8
```
torchvision fails.

You can try it with other packages too, numpy, matplotlib, I just picked pep8, because I knew it wasn't going to be installed as a dependency.


```python
~/t $ pipenv install pep8
Installing pep8…
Collecting pep8
  Using cached pep8-1.7.1-py2.py3-none-any.whl
Installing collected packages: pep8
Successfully installed pep8-1.7.1

Adding pep8 to Pipfile's [packages]…
Locking [dev-packages] dependencies…
Locking [packages] dependencies…
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mark/.local/bin/pipenv", line 11, in <module>
    sys.exit(cli())
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/vendor/click/core.py", line 722, in __call__
    return self.main(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/vendor/click/core.py", line 697, in main
    rv = self.invoke(ctx)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/vendor/click/core.py", line 1066, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/vendor/click/core.py", line 895, in invoke
    return ctx.invoke(self.callback, **ctx.params)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/vendor/click/core.py", line 535, in invoke
    return callback(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/cli.py", line 1934, in install
    do_lock(system=system, pre=pre)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/cli.py", line 1102, in do_lock
    pre=pre
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/utils.py", line 545, in resolve_deps
    resolved_tree = actually_resolve_reps(deps, index_lookup, markers_lookup, project, sources, verbose, clear, pre)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/utils.py", line 507, in actually_resolve_reps
    resolved_tree.update(resolver.resolve(max_rounds=PIPENV_MAX_ROUNDS))
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/piptools/resolver.py", line 102, in resolve
    has_changed, best_matches = self._resolve_one_round()
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/piptools/resolver.py", line 200, in _resolve_one_round
    for dep in self._iter_dependencies(best_match):
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/piptools/resolver.py", line 296, in _iter_dependencies
    dependencies = self.repository.get_dependencies(ireq)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/piptools/repositories/pypi.py", line 153, in get_dependencies
    result = reqset._prepare_file(self.finder, ireq)
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/pip/req/req_set.py", line 639, in _prepare_file
    abstract_dist.prep_for_dist()
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/pip/req/req_set.py", line 134, in prep_for_dist
    self.req_to_install.run_egg_info()
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/pip/req/req_install.py", line 438, in run_egg_info
    command_desc='python setup.py egg_info')
  File "/home/mark/.local/venvs/pipenv/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pipenv/patched/pip/utils/__init__.py", line 707, in call_subprocess
    % (command_desc, proc.returncode, cwd))
pip.exceptions.InstallationError: Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in /tmp/tmp_39myfnkbuild/torch/
```
